author: Mihir Mishra
title: A virus turns India's busiest airports into giant parking lots
description: A virus turns India's busiest airports into giant parking lotsIndia’s top six airports are now home to about 80% of grounded planes.
content: New Delhi: India’s top six airports, including the two biggest hubs of New Delhi and Mumbai, are now home to about 80% of the civilian aircraft that have had to remain on the ground since the authorities enforced a blanked flying ban last week to help contain… [+2479 chars]
